body:
Bazel now use /MD to dynamically link to MSVCRT by default, but you can easily switch to static linking(/MT) by adding `--features=static_link_msvcrt` as a build option. (requires Bazel 0.7.0)

But be aware, using `/MT`  might cause problems like https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12844#issuecomment-328034368
